links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (31,-316,1056).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[1 / ((1 - 8 x) (1 - 11 x) (1 - 12 x)), {x, 0, 20}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 05 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) m:=20; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Integers(), m); Coefficients(R!(1/((1-8*x)*(1-11*x)*(1-12*x)))); /* or */ I:=[1, 31, 645]; [n le 3 select I[n] else 31*Self(n-1)-316*Self(n-2)+1056*Self(n-3): n in [1..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 05 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
